name: collapsible
description: A collapsible displays a header that can be expanded to show its content.

slots.description: The default slot is the content of the collapsible. The oj-c-collapsible element accepts plain text or DOM nodes as children for the default slot.

header.description: The header slot is the collapsible's header. If not specified, the header contains only an open/close icon. Note that the header text is required for JET collapsible for accessibility purposes.

disabled.description: Disables the collapsible if set to true.

expanded.description: Specifies if the content is expanded.

iconPosition.description: Controls placement of the icon in the header.

start.description: icon position is start (default, if unspecified)

variant.description: Controls display of the optional divider below the header.

horizontal-rule.description: displays a horizontal divider between the header and content

ojBeforeCollapse.description: Triggered immediately before the collapsible is collapsed.

accept.description: This method can be called with an application-created Promise to cancel this event asynchronously.  The Promise should be resolved or rejected to accept or cancel the event, respectively.

ojBeforeExpand.description: Triggered immediately before the collapsible is expanded.

accept.description: This method can be called with an application-created Promise to cancel this event asynchronously.  The Promise should be resolved or rejected to accept or cancel the event, respectively.

ojCollapse.description: Triggered after the collapsible has been collapsed.

ojExpand.description: Triggered after the collapsible has been expanded (after animation completes).

setProperty.description: Sets a property or a single subproperty for complex properties and notifies the component of the change, triggering a corresponding event.

params.name: property
params.description: The property name to set. Supports dot notation for subproperty access.

params.name: value
params.description: The new value to set the property to.

getProperty.description: Retrieves the value of a property or a subproperty.

params.name: property
params.description: The property name to get. Supports dot notation for subproperty access.

setProperties.description: Performs a batch set of properties.

params.name: properties
params.description: An object containing the property and value pairs to set.
